glsa.title: FFmpeg: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in FFmpeg, the worst of which may allow remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: FFmpeg is a complete, cross-platform solution to record, convert and stream audio and video.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in FFmpeg. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: Remote attackers could cause a Denial of Service condition via various crafted media file types or have other unspecified impacts.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All FFmpeg users should upgrade to the latest version:
